Interesting Bits 3

Just a few more days to go before Christmas, but we still have time for some interesting bits.

Icon Fonts

GitHub was the first one, now font icons are everywhere.

  • Font Awesome by GitHub
  • Fontello, icon fonts generator
  • IcoMoon, also a generator

Update December, 20th 2012

  • The Big List of Flat Icons & Icon Fonts by Chris Coyer

Tools

What would we do without them.

  • Wireframe.cc, a nice little app for minimal wireframes
  • PopApp, prototype in paper - brilliant concept
  • Slicy, slicing psds can be fun
  • Texture generator, who needs Photoshop
  • 0to255 find variations of any colour
  • Google Maps Custom Marker Maker, I’ve used this generator so many times that I lost track, ‚ù§ it

Node Modules

A couple of Node modules that I found interesting, and that I’m eager to use in the future.

  • Node Romulus, static website generator - just like Jekyll but written in Node.js
  • Wizardy, image processor
  • SSH client

All the best.

17 Dec 2012
